scripts.start:all: npm run start:gateway & npm run start:user & npm run start:product & npm run start:order
scripts.start:all:win: start /B npm run start:gateway & start /B npm run start:user & start /B npm run start:product & start /B npm run start:order
scripts.start:all:mac: npm run start:gateway & npm run start:user & npm run start:product & npm run start:order
scripts.start:all:linux: npm run start:gateway & npm run start:user & npm run start:product & npm run start:order
scripts.restart:all: npm run stop:all && npm run start:all
scripts.restart:all:win: npm run stop:all:win && npm run start:all:win
scripts.restart:all:mac: npm run stop:all:mac && npm run start:all:mac
scripts.restart:all:linux: npm run stop:all:linux && npm run start:all:linux
scripts.stop:all: pkill -f 'node gateway/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/user-service/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/product-service/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/order-service/server.js'
scripts.stop:all:mac: pkill -f 'node gateway/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/user-service/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/product-service/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/order-service/server.js'
scripts.stop:all:linux: pkill -f 'node gateway/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/user-service/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/product-service/server.js' && pkill -f 'node services/order-service/server.js'
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:product" "npm run start:order"
